quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), the Union Cabinet, chaired by the Prime Minister of India, has approved the introduction of the National Research Foundation (NRF) Bill, 2023 in the Parliament.Which of the following statements is/are correct with regards to National Research Foundation (NRF) Bill, 2023?1.      NRF will be established at a total estimated cost of Rs. 60,000 crore during five years (2023-28).2.      Department of Science and Technology (DST) will be the administrative Department of NRF.3.      Union Minister of Science & Technology will be the ex-officio President of the Governing Board of NRF.4.      The bill will also repeal the Science and Engineering Research Board (SERB) and subsume it into NRF.
options: 1 and 4
2 and 4
2 and 3
1, 2, 3 and 4
Only 4

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), the 4th National Water Awards, 2022 were conferred by the Vice President of India at New Delhi. Which of the following pairs is/are correctly matched with regards to the awards?1.      Best State                                                        -     Madhya Pradesh2.      Best Urban Local Body                                  -     Indore Municipal Corporation3.      Best District                                                     -     Adilabad, Telangana4.      Best industry for CSR                                     -     HCL Technologies Ltd., Noida, Uttar Pradesh
options: 1, 3 and 4
1, 2, 3 and 4
1 and 4
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), the Vice President of India launched an animated short film on ‘Piku’, the mascot of National Water Mission during the 4th National Water Awards, 2022 ceremony. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to National Water Mission?1.      NWM has been launched under Swachh Bharat Mission.2.      Goal is to increase water use efficiency by 60%.3.      Goal is promotion of basin level integrated water resources management.
options: 1 and 3
2 only
3 only
1 and 2
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), which of the following ministries has set up Unnat Takniki Pradarshan Kendra (UTPRERAK), a Centre of Excellence?
options: Ministry of Education
Ministry of Power
Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship
Ministry of Commerce and Industry
Ministry of Science and Technology

quiz.text: As per recent (June 2023) news, ____________ has won the contract for running and maintaining the government’s portal for public procurement Government e-Marketplace (GeM).
options: Intellect Design Arena
Birlasoft
Infosys
Tata Consultancy Services (TCS)
Wipro

quiz.text: Udyami Bharat-MSME Day showcased the launch of various initiatives of the Ministry of MSME, dedicated towards growth and development of MSMEs such as ____________ by the Chief Guest and Guest of Honor.
options: Creation and Harmonious Application of Modern Processes for Increasing the Output and National Strength (CHAMPIONS) 2.0 Portal
Mobile App for Geo-tagging of Cluster Projects and Technology Centers
SAARTHI Portal
1 and 2
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: The event (Udyami Bharat-MSME Day) also included the signing of MoUs between the following organizations. Accordingly, Ministry of MSME and _______, signed an MoU to create a portal for ‘PM VIshwakarma KAushal Samman’ (PMVIKAS).
options: NAFED
IFFCO
TRIFED
NABARD
SIDBI

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), eSewa Kendras have been rolled out to bridge the digital divide by providing e filing services to lawyers and litigants. Covering _______ and _______ as pilot project, it is being expanded to cover all court complexes.
options: 20 High courts; one District Court
30 High courts; one District Court
All High courts; one District Court
25 High courts; five District Court
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), Central Government has amended Electricity (Rights of Consumers) Rules, 2020 by Introducing Time of Day (ToD) Tariff and Simplification of Smart Metering rules. Power Tariff to be _______ less during Solar Hours.
options: 25%
20%
40%
15%
30%

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), 12 start-ups from 9 Indian states have been selected as the winners of the Youth Co:Lab National Innovation Dialogue 2022. The winners will receive seed funding of up to _________ to scale up their innovations.
options: USD 5,000
USD 10,000
USD 50,000
USD 25,000
USD 20,000

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), The 9th BRICS Environment Ministers Meeting has been held under the theme of theme, “Advancing Environmental Cooperation amongst BRICS towards the attainment of the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development,” through video conferencing under the Presidency of _____________.
options: China
India
Russia
South Africa
Brazil

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), Centre has extended timeline for disbursement of loan/completion of ethanol projects up to 30 Sep 2023. The government under the scheme is extending financial assistance in the form of interest subvention @ ________ per annum or 50% of the rate of interest charged by banks, whichever is lower, on the loans to be extended by banks for _________ including a one-year moratorium.
options: 3%; five years
6%; five years
4%; five years
6%; four years
4%; four years

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), which of the following entities has launched Nandi (NOC Approval for New Drug and Inoculation System) portal?
options: Ministry of Health & Family Welfare
Ministry of Tourism
World Health Organization
Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying
Moderna Inc.

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), the Department of legal affairs has formed an expert committee to recommend reforms to the Arbitration and Conciliation Act, _________.
options: 2006
2012
1992
1999
1996

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), Centre has allocated 145 Crores rupees to Nagaland for the purpose of Unity Mall in Dimapur. Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with regards to Unity Mall?
options: Union Budget 2023-24 has allocated Rs 500 crore for the construction of Unity Malls across the country.
Unity Mall will function as a one-stop marketplace for ODOP products across the country.
States would be encouraged to set up a “Unity Mall” in their capitals, their most prominent tourism centers, or their financial capitals.
1 and 3
None of the above

quiz.text: Recently (June 2023), India and ________ have inked pact to Enhance Cooperation in Tourism.
options: Germany
United Nations World Tourism Organization (UNWTO)
Spain
Airbnb
Qatar Airways
